feed.title: Cognitive Perception
feed.subtitle: Kubernetes and containers, Distributed systems, Cloud computing, Unix/Linux systems, Data structures and algorithms.

entry.title: Generic Linked List implementation in C

link.title: Generic Linked List implementation in C

entry.content:
Linked <- - -> List is one of the most widely used data structure in the Linux system implementation. It holds special importance in the process scheduling.

We will discuss how Linux use generic Linked List and optimise the process scheduling given the nature of Linked List.

[WIP]
entry.summary: Linked <- - -> List is one of the most widely used data structure in the Linux system implementation. It holds special importance in the process scheduling.
